name: @repo/optimizer
description: AI-powered optimization tool for Unity Asset Store listings

scripts.build-all: npx tsx main.ts build-all --corpus data/corpus/ --out-dir data/results/ --topN 30 --top-percent 15 --best-sellers data/best_seller_assets_full.json
scripts.build-all-multi-pass: npx tsx main.ts build-all-multi-pass --corpus data/corpus/ --out-dir data/results/ --topN 30 --top-percent 15 --best-sellers data/best_seller_assets_full.json
